data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Miguel Cardoso of Belenenses gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Belenenses have a goal kick.
Free kick Nacional.
In the minute 6, Nacional are coming forward and Pedrao gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ruben Micael.
Throw-in Belenenses.
Nacionalâ€™s Ruben Micael is on his feet again at Estadio da Madeira.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
Nacional have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In the minute 10, Nacional attack but Pedrao's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Mateo Cassierra (Belenenses) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 11, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Nacional a goal kick.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Belenenses's Mateo Cassierra gets in a shot on goal at Estadio da Madeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Important block from the Belenenses defence as Joao Camacho fires in a strike for Nacional.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Nacional.
In the minute 17, In Funchal Nacional attack through Witi. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Caue for Belenenses is whistled offside.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Nacional.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Nacional territory.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 22, Brayan Riascos of Nacional smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
Belenenses needs to be cautious. Nacional have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 23, Nacional's Nuno Borges gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Belenenses defender.
Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio da Madeira.
Nacional have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
In the minute 26, Belenenses have a goal kick.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a throw-in for Belenenses, close to Nacional's area.
Belenenses's Mateo Cassierra breaks free at Estadio da Madeira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a Nacional throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Nacional a goal kick.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Funchal a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Vincent Koziello returns to the field for Nacional after picking up a slight injury.
The first-half has come to a close in Funchal.
In the minute 45, Vincent Koziello is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The second half has started at Estadio da Madeira.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio da Madeira.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
Throw-in Belenenses.
In the minute 51, Can Belenenses capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nacional's half?
Petit is making the team's first substitution at Estadio da Madeira with Afonso Sousa replacing Henrique.
Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
In the minute 53, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
Nacional have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Belenenses close to the penalty box.
In the minute 56, In Funchal Nacional's Brayan Riascos is caught offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Vincent Koziello of Nacional is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Nacional are pushing forward but Vincent Koziello's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio da Madeira.
Bruno Ramires is replacing Caue for Belenenses at Estadio da Madeira.
In the minute 64, Can Nacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
Free kick for Nacional in the half of Belenenses.
Richard Rodrigues is replacing Silvestre Varela for the away team.
In Funchal, Witi of Nacional is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 66, Nacional have been awarded a corner by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Belenenses a goal kick.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards Belenenses a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Nacional's Witi is whistled for offside at Estadio da Madeira.
Nacional make their first substitution with Joao Victor replacing Vincent Thill.
Luis Freire (Nacional) is making a second substitution, with Larry Azouni replacing Vincent Koziello.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Nacional.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Nacional in the half of Belenenses.
Free kick Nacional.
Belenenses have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Belenenses.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
The home team replace Joao Camacho with Kenji Gorre.
Afonso Taira for Belenenses has been booked by Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira and receives a first yellow card.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira waits before resuming play because Ruben Micael for Nacional is still down.
In the minute 82, The away team have replaced Mateo Cassierra with Edi Semedo. This is the fourth substitution made today by Petit.
Throw-in Belenenses.
Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
In the minute 84, Nacional's Ruben Micael looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Joao Victor (Nacional) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Belenenses!
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tiago Esgaio (Belenenses) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 86, Luis Freire (Nacional) has taken off Ruben Micael who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Abdullahi Ibrahim Alhassan is the replacement.
Luis Freire (Nacional) is making a fifth substitution, with Bryan Rochez replacing Brayan Riascos.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio da Madeira.
Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, Vitor Jorge Fernandes Ferreira signals a free kick to Belenenses.
Free kick Nacional.
Nacional's Witi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Funchal.
Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Larry Azouni for Nacional gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Belenenses have a goal kick.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
